Not only we guarantee the fastest and the most exciting returns on your investments, but we also guarantee the security of your investment. Investment Plans To make a solid investment, you have to know where you are investing. Find a plan which is best for you. BEGINNER Return 0.8% Every Day For 5 Day / week $20 COMPETENT Return 1 % $100 PROVICIENT $500 EXPERT SPONSOR BONUS Level 1 >>> 10 % Why Choose Cuenta Capital Our goal is to provide our investors with a reliable source of high income, while minimizing any possible risks and offering a high-quality service. Legal Company Our company conducts absolutely legal activities in the legal field. We are certified to operate investment business, we are legal and safe. High reliability We are trusted by a huge number of people. We are working hard constantly to improve the level of our security system and minimize possible risks. Anonymity Anonymity and using cryptocurrency as a payment instrument. In the era of electronic money – this is one of the most convenient ways of cooperation. Quick Withdrawal Our all retreats are treated spontaneously once requested. There are high maximum limits. The minimum withdrawal amount is only $30 . Referral Program We are offering a certain level of referral income through our referral program. you can increase your income by simply refer a few people. 24/7 Support We provide 24/7 customer support through e-mail. Our support representatives are periodically available to elucidate any difficulty. Dedicated Server We are using a dedicated server for the website which allows us exclusive use of the resources of the entire server. SSL Secured Comodo Essential-SSL Security encryption confirms that the presented content is genuine and legitimate. DDOS Protection We are using one of the most experienced, professional, and trusted DDoS Protection and mitigation provider. How Works Get involved in our tremendous platform and Invest. We will utilize your money and give you profit in your wallet automatically. 1 Create 2 Invest To Plan 3 Get Profit Frequently Asked Questions We answer some of your Frequently Asked Questions regarding our platform. If you have a query that is not answered here, Please contact us. When can I deposit/withdraw from my Investment account? Deposit are available for at any time, and withdrawal are available every friday, Be sure, that your funds are not used in any ongoing trade before the withdrawal. The available amount is shown in your dashboard on the main page of Investing platform. How do I check my account balance? You can see this anytime on your accounts dashboard. I forgot my password, what should I do? Visit the password reset page, type in your email address and click the `Reset` button. How will I know that the withdrawal has been successful? You will get an automatic notification once we send the funds and you can always check your transactions or account balance. Your chosen payment system dictates how long it will take for the funds to reach you. How much can I withdraw? You can withdraw the full amount of your account balance minus the funds that are used currently for supporting opened positions. Get Started Today With Us This is a Revolutionary Money Making Platform! Invest Earn Repeat… and Make Fast Money. Not only we guarantee the fastest and the most exciting returns on your investments, but we also guarantee the security of your investment. Payment We Accept We accept USDT payment methods to make your investment process easier with our platform. All types of investment are risky and are each individual's responsibility.

thought: The text extracted from the website contains several red flags that may indicate a scam. They promise unusually high returns with claims of fast and exciting returns on investments, which fits the characteristic of promising an amount of money generally not possible. The site also targets psychological weaknesses by offering a sense of urgency and ease in making money online. Furthermore, they mention the use of cryptocurrency for anonymity, which could be a tactic to avoid traceability. Additionally, the text mentions a legal company and SSL security, but these claims need to be verified. There is also mention of a referral program, which is common in Ponzi or pyramid schemes.

There was an error retrieving the WHOIS information, so I cannot verify the domain registration details at this point. I will attempt to check the certificate information to see if there's any legitimacy to the claim of SSL security.

thought: The certificate information confirms that the website has SSL security. However, this does not necessarily confirm the legitimacy of the business operations, as many scam websites also use SSL certificates to appear trustworthy. Next, I want to check the DNS records to see if there is any unusual setup that could indicate a temporary or fraudulent website.

The DNS record only shows an HINFO record, which is unusual as I would expect to see A, MX, and possibly other records for a legitimate business website. This could indicate that the website is not set up as a typical business website. Since there are red flags from the website's content and unusual DNS records, I will check for user reports or discussions about this website on social media and forums to see if there are any scam accusations or user experiences shared.

There are no results from the Reddit search, which means there's no user feedback or discussions about the website there. This lack of presence on a popular platform like Reddit could be a red flag, as legitimate businesses often have some level of discussion or mentions online. To get a broader view of the website's reputation, I will search on another social platform.

There are no results from the Twitter search either, which adds to the suspicion as legitimate businesses or investment platforms are often mentioned or discussed on social media. Given the lack of social media presence, unusual DNS records, the promises of high returns, use of cryptocurrency, and the referral program, I now have enough information to make a final assessment. I now know the final answer. Based on the observations, it is likely that https://cuentacapital.com/ is a scam website.

observation.reason: The website promises unusually high and fast returns on investments targets psychological weaknesses with claims of easy money uses cryptocurrency for anonymity lacks social media presence and has unusual DNS records. These are all indicative of a fake investment platform and match the characteristics of a scam website.
